title: Skins
body: When the EUNE will get the the new skins for Warwick Lux and Nasus?

replies.body: We don't have exact dates for those skins, but you can look for those in the shop once the Lunar Revel 'event' starts. New skins are generally added shortly after the patch drops, so I'd start looking for those around Wed of next week. Also, be sure to check the [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) as well for any announcements.

The Lunar Revel skins along with the valentine skins will most likely see daylight during patch 8.3, the scheduled release date is coming Wednesday. Note that Lunar Revel(chinese new year is on the 16th of February, so they might not be released on date of the patch release.

u r in EUW I am in EUNE

and u mean we will get the new skins at 16 February?
